attributes.action: Instigate a review into Credit Card Companies continuing to increase interest rates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Credit card rates hit 12-year high
Figures released by Moneyfacts, the price comparison website, have revealed that credit card interest rates are at their highest level for 12 years, with the average rate now standing at 18.8pc. The Halifax has just lifted the rate it charges some of its credit card customers by up to 5pc

With the Bank of England Base Rate at its current level of 0.5% surely the Credit Card Companies are exploiting their customers

I would ask that there be a review conducted into the Credit Card Complanie
